body:
Hi Imran,


If you downloaded the installer from the NREL page between June 16 and about an hour ago, I apologize – that one was messed up. Please download the new version there now, and *follow* the instructions on the download page for setting your environment (PATH and RAYPATH), and you should be good to go.


https://openstudio.nrel.gov/getting-started-developer/getting-started-radiance


- Rob
___
